required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Impact of Supra-renal Fixation of EVAR on Hemodynamics of Renal Arteries
clinical_study.official_title: To Assess Hemodynamic Disturbances to the Ostia of the Renal Arteries Generated by the Implantation of EVAR With a Suprarenal Fixation

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators conducted a bicentric prospective study to quantify the hemodynamic disturbances to the ostia of the renal arteries generated by the implantation EVAR with suprarenal fixation immediately postoperatively.

primary_outcome.measure: systolic maximum speed at the ostia of the renal arteries
primary_outcome.description: Quantify the hemodynamic disturbances to the ostia of the renal arteries generated by the implantation of a suprarenal fixation aortic stent immediately postoperatively.

secondary_outcome.measure: systolic maximum speed at the ostia of the renal arteries
secondary_outcome.description: Quantify the hemodynamic disturbances to the ostia of the renal arteries generated by the implantation of a suprarenal fixation aortic stent immediately postoperatively.

secondary_outcome.measure: proportion of patients with renal artery stenosis
proportion of disappearance of the "notch" (pre-systolic notch)
proportion of increase in systolic rise time
proportion of decrease of the resistance index

secondary_outcome.description: estimation of the glomerular filtration rate calculated by CKD-EPI between the preoperative and at one year

arm_group.description: every patients are in the same arm and have EVAR with supra-renal fixation

intervention.description: Patient will be enrolled when the decision of an endovascular procedure with supra renal fixation is required. Before the intervention, Duplex scan will be necessary to evaluate renal arteries ostia. This exam will be realised in the month after the intervention and one year later.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- elective EVAR with supra renal fixation
- women who have been postmenopausal for at least 24 months or are surgically sterilized, or for women of childbearing potential, use of an effective method of contraception
- consent to participate
- Affiliation to a French social security
Exclusion Criteria:
- stenosis of at least one renal artery
- dialysis
- rupture of abdominal aortic aneurysm
- renal stenting during the procedure
- fenestrated EVAR
- legal incapacity or limited legal capacity
- subject being in the exclusion period of another study
- pregnant woman
